name: The Tainted Touch
description:
(This was a collaboration with myself and 2 other artists, the music was by Ryan Whyman and the Art by  https://desichan.itch.io)

Explore the randomly generating dungeon of The Tainted Touch, fighting you way through any enemy that stands in your way and using any treasure you find to escape back out to freedom.

This is a fun basic dungeon crawler with the protagonist aarmed with nothing but holy water.  The only way to refill it is to bless your own tears (hold shift to cry, hold space to bless) and fight for your life
